title: It Begins With Goodbye
alternative_title: Hajimari wa Sayonara ; It Started with a Goodbye ; はじまりはさよなら ; 从再见开始
status: Hajimari wa Sayonara ; It Started with a Goodbye ; はじまりはさよなら ; 从再见开始
description:
Description :
        Kurosu Kei like mediocrity, works in a normal and go out on dates with guys… But he is not human office. In fact, the reason for him to go out on dates is that it feeds the vital energy of the people with whom he comes out. Still, you never see completely satisfied and fed, but this changes when he meets Kyle Shou, the owner of a hotel. However, it seems that this intense man knows the past…? [Paradise Love Scanlations]
